titleInfo.title: Country Music Spectacular at the Vets Memorial Auditorium

mods.abstract: One color window card (black on white) announcing the Country Music Spectacular featuring Kitty Wells, Johnny Wright, Bill Phillips, Carl and Pearl Butler, Ruby Wright, the Harden Trio, and the Tennessee Mountain Boys at the Vets Memorial Auditorium on February 26. Poster features metal photoplates of Kitty Wells, Johnny Wright, Bill Phillips, Carl and Pearl Butler, and the Harden Trio.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
